section.title: DROP INDEX Statement
section.programlisting:
drop_index : DROP INDEX NAME opt_table ;
opt_table : /* empty */ | q_table_name ;
section.para: This will drop an index, dba privileges or table ownership are required. A table's primary key which has the same name as the table can not be dropped.
Optionally, a table name can be given if the index name is not unique. The table name may be qualified.
